definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
non-Han people, esp. to the East of China/barbarians/to wipe out/to exterminate/to tear down/to raze

sentences.english: The Hawaiian island reefs have largely been in decline ever since.
sentences.chinese: 從那以後，夏威夷島的珊瑚大量減少。

sentences.english: She tried telling me about her island home.
sentences.chinese: 她給我講她那夏威夷島上的家。

sentences.english: Hibiscus flowers are a familiar flower to be found in tropical regions including the Hawaiian Islands.
sentences.chinese: 木槿花是一種熱帶地區包括夏威夷島上常見的花卉。
